findings.title: A01. No range verification for swapPoolFee
findings.description: No range verification is performed on the swapPoolFee parameter when changing configurations, which may lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Inaccurate Total Amounts Calculation
findings.description: The `PrivateStrategy` contract's `getTotalAmounts()` function may return inaccurate total amounts of `token0` and `token1` due to outdated values retrieved from the Uniswap V3 pool.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: Inherent trust on privileged accounts `_owner` and `operator` in contracts `PrivateVault` and `PrivateStrategy`, allowing them to change core parameters and update whiteLists.

findings.title: Meaningful Events For Important State Changes
findings.description: In Ethereum, events are indispensable and mainly used to record runtime dynamics. Specifically, when system-wide parameters or settings are being changed, there is a lack of emitting related event that reflect important state changes.
